id.description: The unique identifier of the milestone

iid.description: The internal identifier of the milestone

group_id.description: The unique identifier of the group to which the milestone belongs

title.description: The title or name of the milestone

description.description: The detailed description of the milestone

state.description: The current state of the milestone (e.g., open, closed)

created_at.description: The datetime when the milestone was created

updated_at.description: The datetime when the milestone was last updated

due_date.description: The date by which the milestone is expected to be completed

start_date.description: The date when the milestone is scheduled to start

expired.description: Indicates whether the milestone has expired

web_url.description: The URL to access the milestone in the web interface
